Evalute your trig functions of a triangle

\begin{array}{ll}\ny_{1} & \sin \theta= \\\n\cos \theta & = \\\n\tan \theta & = \\\n\csc \theta & = \\\n\sec \theta & = \\\n\cot \theta & =\n\end{array}[imath]y_{1} & \sin \theta= [/imath] [imath]\cos \theta & = [/imath] [imath]\tan \theta & = [/imath] [imath]\csc \theta & = [/imath] [imath]\sec \theta & = [/imath] [imath]\cot \theta & =[/imath]
